law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Child" means an individual who is under the age of 13 years.

section.section: "Children's product" means a product designed or intended primarily for a child as specified in federal law.

"Children's product" does not include:
Food as defined in § 21-101 of the Health - General Article; or
Any component part of a children's product that is not accessible to a child through normal and reasonably foreseeable use and abuse of the product as specified in federal law.

text.section: "Federal law" means the Consumer Product Safety Act of 2008 and regulations adopted under the Act.

"Lead-containing product" means a product in which any part, component, or coating of the product contains lead or lead compounds greater than the lesser of:
0.06% by weight of the total weight of the part, component, or coating; or
The standard established under federal law regarding the permissible level of lead in children's products.
"Manufacturer" means a person that is the brand owner of a product.
